attributes.action: Prevent changes to Bob the Builder
attributes.additional_details:
HIT Entertainment the producers of much loved children's character Bob the Builder are supposedly updating it to use computer animation rather than traditional stop animation and changing the voices behind the characters from the iconic voice of Neil Morrissey to some other actors.

I would like the government to take out an injunction against the makers of Bob the Builder to ensure that the original (much loved) format and voices continue for future generations of children to enjoy.
